proposal1.heroHeadline: KBD is losing 200 hours annually on manual proposals. Let's see why.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Currently, proposals are manual and slow. With our system, proposals are ready in 47 seconds.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Here are the ongoing losses KBD faces with current proposal processes.

problems.title: Time Drain
problems.description: KBD spends 200 hours annually creating proposals. Each hour lost could have been used to secure new clients.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Proposals sometimes lack consistent branding. This inconsistency can cost KBD deals worth thousands each month.

problems.title: Human Error
problems.description: Manual entry leads to errors. Correcting these mistakes costs KBD both credibility and potential revenue.

problems.title: Opportunity Cost
problems.description: For every manual proposal, there's a missed chance to focus on campaign innovation. This could mean losing $5,000 in potential projects.

problems.title: Delayed Responses
problems.description: Delayed proposal submissions mean lost opportunities. Each delay could cost a client relationship worth $10,000 annually.

problems.title: High Staff Costs
problems.description: Kevin and his team spend valuable time on proposals. This results in increased labor costs, bleeding $15,000 annually.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Introducing a system that replaces these costly inefficiencies with speed and accuracy.

solutions.title: Rapid Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take hours to draft. Our system completes them in under 60 seconds.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Branding varies across proposals. Our system ensures every proposal aligns perfectly with KBD's image.

solutions.title: Error-Free Drafts
solutions.description: Manual input causes errors. Automated proposals eliminate mistakes, ensuring accuracy.

solutions.title: Immediate Client Engagement
solutions.description: Delayed responses lose deals. Our system allows KBD to engage clients instantly.

solutions.title: Cost-Efficient Operations
solutions.description: High staff hours inflate costs. The system reduces labor needs, saving KBD money.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for KBD's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for KBD around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for KBD.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Transform Acme Corp's Revenue with KBD's Expertise.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Leverage KBD's proven marketing strategies to increase conversions and drive growth.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Acme Corp is currently experiencing significant revenue losses due to unoptimized marketing efforts.

problems.title: High Bounce Rate
problems.description: Every visitor who leaves your site without engaging is potential revenue lost. A 60% bounce rate means over half of your traffic is wasted.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rate
problems.description: With a conversion rate below 2%, Acme Corp is missing out on turning visitors into customers. This equates to thousands in lost sales monthly.

problems.title: Poor Brand Recognition
problems.description: Without a strong brand presence, Acme Corp struggles to stand out, resulting in lost competitive edge and customer loyalty.

problems.title: Inefficient Ad Spend
problems.description: Current ad strategies are not yielding desired returns. Overspending on underperforming ads costs Acme Corp up to $10K monthly.

problems.title: Weak Social Media Engagement
problems.description: Low interaction rates on social platforms mean missed opportunities for customer interaction and brand growth.

problems.title: Outdated Website Design
problems.description: An outdated site negatively impacts user experience, leading to a 25% decrease in potential online sales.

proposal2.solutionIntro: KBD's solutions directly address each of these challenges, transforming losses into growth opportunities.

solutions.title: Digital Marketing Strategy
solutions.description: We will optimize your digital presence to lower bounce rates and boost conversions.

solutions.title: Brand Development
solutions.description: Enhance brand recognition with a cohesive and compelling brand strategy.

solutions.title: PPC Management
solutions.description: Optimize your ad spend to ensure maximum ROI and reduce wasted budget.

solutions.title: Website Redesign
solutions.description: Revamp your website to improve user experience and increase sales.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: KBD is positioned to transform Acme Corp's marketing efforts into measurable success.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Expertise
whyUsCards.description: Our team has a track record of delivering results for businesses like yours.

whyUsCards.title: Data-Driven Approach
whyUsCards.description: We use real data to drive our strategies, ensuring effective outcomes.

whyUsCards.title: Client-Centric
whyUsCards.description: Your success is our priority. We tailor our services to meet your needs.

whyUsCards.title: Innovative Solutions
whyUsCards.description: We stay ahead of industry trends to provide cutting-edge services.

proposal2.teamIntro: Our dedicated team is here to ensure your success.

team.name: Kevin Brown
team.bio: Kevin leads the strategy and client relationships at KBD, with a focus on achieving measurable results.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Research
process.description: We begin with an in-depth analysis of your current marketing efforts.

process.title: Strategy Development
process.description: We craft a tailored strategy to address identified challenges.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: Our team puts the strategy into action across all platforms.

process.title: Review & Optimize
process.description: We analyze results and make data-driven adjustments.

proposal2.pricingIntro: Choose from our investment options to drive your growth.

pricing.name: Basic Plan
pricing.description: Ideal for small businesses looking to optimize their existing efforts.

pricing.name: Growth Plan
pricing.description: Recommended for businesses ready to significantly increase their market presence.

pricing.name: Enterprise Plan
pricing.description: Perfect for large companies looking for comprehensive marketing solutions.

proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's discuss how we can help Acme Corp reach its goals. Schedule a conversation today.
